EmailTemplate.name: Octurbofest 2014.Reg Confirmation - Day Only
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmed: Octurbofest 2014 (Conference Only)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{Lead.First Name:default=}}: Thank you for registering to attend Octurbofest 2014! You have elected to register for the Conference Only. Details for your reservation are below. {{Lead.First Name:default=}} {{Lead.Last Name:default=}} {{company.Company Name:default=}}
Octurbofest Conference Only
Octurbofest 2014 Wednesday, October 8 10:00 a.m. – 4:00 p.m. The Omni Parker House Hotel | The King Room, Mezzanine Level 60 School Street, Boston, MA 02108
We cannot wait to see you at this exciting event. If you have any questions, please contact marketing@vmturbo.com <mailto:marketing@vmturbo.com>.
Team Turbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
